Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.Movement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cruise, Flank, Halt
    public abstract class Movement
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Base of all movement types that are used to initiate a move for a unit.

    • Field Detail

      • BASE_GUNNERY

        public static final int BASE_GUNNERY
        Base gunnery modifier. This will be added to all gunnery (attack) modifier calculations.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movement

        public Movement​(HexMap map,
                int movementPoints)
        Construct a movement object.
        Parameters:
        map - the map that movement will be on
        movementPoints - how many movement points to initialize the mover with

      • Movement

        public Movement​(Movement other)
        Copy constructor.
        Parameters:
        other - movement to copy

    • Method Detail

      • getMovementCost

        protected int getMovementCost​(Hex hex)
        Get the movement cost to move into the given hex coordinate.
        Parameters:
        hex - the hex coordinate to get the movement cost for
        Returns:
        movement cost for the given hex

      • decrementMovementPoints

        protected void decrementMovementPoints​(int movementCost)
                                throws MovementPointsExhaustedException
        Decrement the internal movement point counter.
        Parameters:
        movementCost - how many movement points to use up
        Throws:
        MovementPointsExhaustedException - if there are no movement points before the decrement

      • visitHex

        protected void visitHex​(Hex hex)
        Record a visit to a hex.
        Parameters:
        hex - visited hex grid

      • getMovementPoints

        public int getMovementPoints()
        Get the number of movement points remaining.
        Returns:
        remaining movement points

      • getToHitModifier

        Returns:
        to hit modifier

      • getGunneryModifier

        public int getGunneryModifier()
        Get the gunnery modifier created by the movement so far.
        Returns:
        gunnery (attack) modifier

      • moveForward

        public Hex moveForward​(Hex hex,
                       Direction facing)
                throws MovementPointsExhaustedException
        Move unit forward one unit.
        Parameters:
        hex - current hex coordinate
        facing - current facing direction
        Returns:
        new hex coordinate
        Throws:
        MovementPointsExhaustedException - if no movement points remain for the movement
        UnsupportedOperationException - if forwards movement is not supported for the movement type

      • moveBackward

        public Hex moveBackward​(Hex hex,
                        Direction facing)
                 throws MovementPointsExhaustedException
        Move unit backward one unit.
        Parameters:
        hex - current hex coordinate
        facing - current facing direction
        Returns:
        new hex coordinate
        Throws:
        MovementPointsExhaustedException - if no movement points remain for the movement
        UnsupportedOperationException - if backwards movement is not supported for the movement type

        Rotate unit to the right.

        facing - current facing direction
        Returns:
        new facing direction
        Throws:
        MovementPointsExhaustedException - if no movement points remain for the movement
        UnsupportedOperationException - if right rotation is not supported for the movement type
